title: The New Generation Lacks Respect? Oscar Onley Has (Kind) Fighting Words for Geraint’s Old Guard
content:
He's already won the queen stage of the Tour Down Under in just his second season. What's to come for the 21-year-old?

Read the full article at The New Generation Lacks Respect? Oscar Onley Has (Kind) Fighting Words for Geraint’s Old Guard on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
